sentences.en: At the premium end of the market, business is booming.
Business is booming and foreigners are scrambling to invest.
sentences.cn: 商业繁荣，外国人争相投资。

sentences.en: He is booming as a teacher.
sentences.cn: 作为一位教师,他日趋成功.

sentences.en: He was falsely jovial, with his booming, mirthless laugh.
sentences.cn: 他低声苦笑了几声，装出快乐的样子。

sentences.en: His booming voice cut in again.
sentences.cn: 他洪亮的声音又插了进来.

sentences.en: In two days the solicitude would be booming.
sentences.cn: 不出两天,这种忧虑的心情可就该突飞猛涨了.

sentences.en: It has a booming tourist industry.
sentences.cn: 其旅游产业在蓬勃发展。

sentences.en: The booming telephone voice cut through his dilemma.
sentences.cn: 电话中的宏亮嗓音容不得他兀自发窘.

sentences.en: The opera singer has a deep, booming , masculine voice.
sentences.cn: 这位歌剧演唱家有一副深沉而又浑厚有力的嗓音.

sentences.en: There was a booming of bells and Crawford said, " There it is. "
sentences.cn: 钟声沉重地响了,克劳夫德说: “ 钟响了. ”

sentences.en: There was considerable scepticism about the Chancellor's forecast of a booming economy.
sentences.cn: 有相当多的人对财政大臣作出的经济会迅猛发展的预测表示怀疑。

words.tran_cn: 生育高峰中出生的人；赶往新兴地区安家的人；发出隆隆声者；发育完全的雄袋鼠
兴旺的，繁荣的；大受欢迎的
兴旺（boom的ing形式）；发出隆隆声

trans.tran_cn: 激增( boom的现在分词 )，猛涨，发出隆隆声，以低沉有力的声音说话
